column4: i want to reap the benefits of linux but i dont know how to go about this
reap the benefits? what benefits?
lol what benefits i dunno.. 3d interface ;x
o.O
and that's it? that's the only reason you want to use linux? is because of the 3d interface? you're a strange one
no i want to learn how to use it for MySQL databases ect..
i would recommend installing it on a virtual machine rather than dual-booting if you really want to try it
virtual machine... how do i do this ?
i'll show you. care for a private message?
yes please
are you perhaps an unregistered member of freenode? if so it would explain why you can't see my private message to you
i am unregistered
i dont know what freenode is
i saw your first private message
did you get the website?
you're using irc.freenode.net (an irc network)
ya i am on irc.freenode.net
ya i am on irc.freenode.net
yes i saw your link
cool
dont you see my private messages?
no
but i'm going anyway. have fun with ubuntu. bye
